eric_wallace_1952780411660321180.content: Today we release gpt-oss-120b and gpt-oss-20b—two open-weight LLMs that deliver strong performance and agentic tool use.  Before release, we ran a first of its kind safety analysis where we fine-tuned the models to intentionally maximize their bio and cyber capabilities
